official_title: Navigate Study: Use of a Community-Based Health Coach to Improve Access to Germline Genetic Testing Among African American Men With Prostate Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Age >= 18 years old
* Speak and read English
* Have no known cancer risk genetic mutation
* Self-identify as Black or African American
* Self-report a diagnosis of regional (lymph node positive), advanced, or metastatic prostate cancer per National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) guidelines
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Prior germline genetic test
* Age < 18 years old
* Unable to read or answer forms
